data.title: $27 trillion AUM is perched over Bitcoin and crypto: CoinShares CSO
data.text: The top eight financial institutions with an interest in Bitcoin and crypto have a whopping $27 trillion in combined assets under management.

data.title: Jack Dorsey-Backed Damus Says It Faces App Store Removal For Bitcoin Tipping Despite App Update
data.text: Social media platform Damus, which utilizes Jack Dorsey-backed decentralized social platform, Nostr, is being removed from the Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) App Store for violating the tech giant's guideline on “business payments.” What Happened: Damus features a function for users to provide Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) tips for the posts they like, which has been flagged by the App Store for violating its policy on in-app purchases only being allowed through Apple's service.

data.title: Bitcoin Price Aims Higher But 100 SMA Is The Key
data.text: Bitcoin price is attempting a fresh increase from the $30,000 zone. BTC could gain bullish momentum if it clears $30,500 and the 100 hourly SMA.

data.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Trade Mixed As ETF-Induced Rally Pauses: Analyst Predicts Strong July For King Crypto Amid Vanishing 'Crypto Death' Fears
data.text: Major cryptocurrencies traded mixed on Monday evening following a week-long rally that was driven by several crypto-related exchange-traded funds (ETF) applications in the U.S. This comes as the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on Sunday approved the nation's first leveraged Bitcoin futures ETF offered by Volatility Shares, a Florida-based investment firm.

data.title: Bitcoin Price Faces Critical Test at $30,000 Mark Amidst Economic Events
data.text: Bitcoin's price is currently at a crucial juncture as it hovers around the $30,000 mark, prompting speculation about its next move. While briefly dipping below this level, the key question remains whether it will hold as support or if a more significant battle is unfolding.

data.title: HSBC Hong Kong Allows Customers To Trade Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs on its Investment Platform
data.text: HSBC Hong Kong, the largest lender in Hong Kong, has become the first bank to allow its customers access to Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange traded funds (ETFs) on its investment platform.

data.title: First Mover Asia: Bitcoin Could Experience Price Turbulence as $30K Is Tested
data.text: ALSO: Venture capitalists and others have abandoned blockchain for the seemingly greener pastures of AI, but they may be falling for the hype of a technology that has yet to prove itself substantially.

data.title: Meet Nodeless, The Non-KYC Bitcoin Lightning Processor Jack Dorsey Tweeted About
data.text: The platform makes it possible to accept Bitcoin Lightning payments without Know-Your-Customer requirements.

data.title: Crypto Trader Capo Predicts Doom and Gloom for Bitcoin, Ethereum and Altcoins
data.text: A popular cryptocurrency trader known only by his nom de guerre Capo, which has been bearish on the cryptocurrency market for months, has issued a stark warning to the community, predicting doom and gloom for leading cryptocurrencies Bitcoin, Ethereum, and altcoins.

data.title: WisdomTree exec says data sharing agreements are a “key part” of Bitcoin ETF applications
data.text: Jeremy Schwartz, Global Chief Investment Officer at WisdomTree, commented on cryptocurrency spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) on June 26.

data.title: BTC and a Return to $31,000 in the Hands of US Stats and the Courts
data.text: It is a bearish start to the day for BTC. While Binance took an early loss on Monday, an Ripple victory against the SEC would turn the table on the SEC.

data.title: Bitcoin Tipping Service Damus Gets Booted From Apple App Store
data.text: Damus tried to clarify that tipping isn't used to "unlock content"—but to no avail.

data.title: Solana, Polygon, Cardano Still Recovering From the SEC Calling Them Securities
data.text: The handful of tokens the SEC called securities have lost 15%, or $5 billion, off their collective market capitalizations since the start of June.

data.title: Bitcoin Mining Firm Riot Secures 33,000 New Rigs for $162 Million
data.text: The firm also claimed an option to potentially purchase another 66,000 machines.

data.title: Rugby Champion Jarryd Hayne Lost Almost $800K in a Bitcoin Scam: Report
data.text: The crypto scammer purportedly drained more than $2 million from Hayne and five other prisoners at Cooma Correctional Centre.

data.title: Bitcoin's $30k fortification developing cracks?
data.text: As Bitcoin surges past $30,000, CryptoQuant data warns of an impending price correction. Increased inflows and declining indicators raise concerns for investors.

data.title: Spain's Largest Bank Joins List Of Financial Institutions Exploring Bitcoin
data.text: Santander's new found interest signals shifting sentiment towards bitcoin and may be an indication of increased institutional demand.

data.title: Bitcoin, Tech Stock Correlation Hits Three-Year Low
data.text: Bitcoin and gold have meanwhile passed the 50% correlation point, according to Kaiko Research.

data.title: The Blessing Of July: Can Bitcoin Climb To $36,000 In The Coming Month?
data.text: The month of June is quickly drawing to an end and although the price of Bitcoin is maintaining a bullish streak, it is still sitting well below expectations. However, all hope is not lost as the market moves into the month of July which has historically been a bullish month for the digital asset.

data.title: Why Bitcoin Price Is Destined To Pump In July 2023?
data.text: Crypto Market News: The recent crypto market rally came just around the time before closing of a huge chunk of Bitcoin and Ethereum options, potentially paving way for significant volatility. Around 40% of the average daily volume in options market is dominated by Bitcoin and Ethereum quarterly positions.
